Detailed Description

UHPI functional layer inline header file for HPI access from host.

  • The defines inline function definitions

Path: \(CSLPATH)\ inc

HPID_read_auto(int trans_length, long unsigned int *HPID_buffer)

change with each data transfer

HPID_write_auto(int trans_length, long unsigned int *HPID_buffer)
